titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2355) to authorize appropriations for environmental research, development, and demonstration for the fiscal years 1988 and 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-118.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2355 (Environmental Protection Agency funding).
